text: Believe It may refer to: * Believe It (album), a 1975 album by the New Tony Williams Lifetime * "Believe It" (Meek Mill song), 2013 * "Believe It" (White Lies song), 2018 * "Believe It" (PartyNextDoor and Rihanna song), 2020 * Believe It (horse), an American bred racehorse * Believe it (catchphrase) Used by the anime character Naruto Uzumaki
title: Believe It
